item.title: [HELP] Making my Range Combat Style Stronger [PI] Will Rep
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

  1. Find your Ranged combat methods.
  2. Find where your Ranged combat formulas are at.
  3. Edit the formulas according to the math you want.

OR

You can be cheap about it and just use Equipment Bonuses. If they even work for Ranged that is.

Read full topic
